detaileddescription.para: MEMCPY-like macro to copy to/from struct eth_addr's that are no local variables and known to be 16-bit aligned within the protocol header.
MEMCPY-like macro to copy to/from struct eth_addr's that are local variables or known to be 32-bit aligned within the protocol header.
A list of often ethtypes (although lwIP does not use all of them):
